start:
Hi! I'm a bot that can help you
collect
characters from different series. ğŸ’¬ â€” Start by setting the language in /language, use /help to find out the bot's commands. â• â€” Add me to a group to start collecting characters!
help:
ğŸ’¬ â€” Bot's command list:
General â›±
/start - Starts the bot. /help - Displays this message. /language - Changes the language used to display messages.
Groups ğŸ¤¼
/list - Lists in an album all the characters you have collected. /list i - Lists individually all the characters you have collected. (.l, /l) /character <id|name> - Shows the information of a character. (.c, /c, /char, .p, /p, /perso) /series <id|title> - Shows the information of a series. (.s, /s, /serie, .o, /o, /obra) /series i <id|title> - Shows individually all the characters of a series. (.si, .oi) /delete <id> - Remove a character from the collection. (.d, /d)
